entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.0°C

Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 10:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
